UiFormulaRule.name: UiFormulaRule
UiFormulaRule.description: Represents a set of one or more filters that define the conditions under which a component displays on a Lightning page.

AssociatedElementId.description: Represents a parent component that UiFormulaRule is associated with, such as PromptVersion.

BooleanFilter.description: Represents the filter logic applied to UiFormulaRule. References the UI formula rule stored by UiFormulaCriterion based on the sortIndex, such as ((1 && 3) || 2).

DeveloperName.description: Represents the API name of the UiFormulaRule.

Formula.description: Represents the formula source string of UiFormulaRule.

Language.description: Represents the language of the UiFormulaRule.

MasterLabel.description: Required. Represents the label of the UiFormulaRule.

ParentKeyPrefix.description: Represents the three-digit prefix for AssociatedElementId.
